body: My vague understanding is that the first class ports are the ones for which we provide a binary download.  According to https://golang.org/doc/install.html that is "FreeBSD (release 8-STABLE and above), Linux, Mac OS X (10.8 and above), and Windows operating systems and the 32-bit (386) and 64-bit (amd64) x86 processor architectures."  According to the downloads page, that is darwin/amd64, freebsd/386, freebsd/amd64, linux/386, linux/amd64, linux/arm, linux/s390, windows/386, windows/amd64.
